tasks.task: Build and operate a log hopper for forestry operations.
subtasks: Introduce yourself and explain the origin and purpose of the log hopper.
Demonstrate the winch system and its wiring.
Explain the walking beam suspension and its benefits.
Describe the chain keepers and their safe usage.
Highlight the trolley system and its adjustability.
Show how the machine handles loads and obstacles.
Demonstrate safety features, such as the swivel tongue.
Describe the log cradle and tongs.
